mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement-the only bank where your every unreasonable demand is our top priority! Get ready to experience the ultimate in entitled banking!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I was at my local coffee shop, waiting in line like a regular citizen, when suddenly I realized I had forgotten my wallet. Panic set in, but then I remembered-I'm Hot Josh, the CEO of Bank of Entitlement! I confidently strode up to the counter, cut in front of everyone, and proudly announced, "I'm Hot Josh, and I demand a free latte, extra foam, no questions asked!" The barista, clearly starstruck, complied immediately. As I sipped my complimentary latte, I couldn't help but bask in my own entitlement. After all, why should I inconvenience myself like the common folk when I have a bank that caters to my every whim? And that latte? It tasted even better knowing it was a product of my sheer entitlement.
